title: 76/271. Addressing racism and promoting dignity for all in the United Nations Secretariat

paragraphs.1: Takes note of the report of the Secretary-General;
paragraphs.2: Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions;
paragraphs.3: Approves the establishment of eight new general temporary assistance positions for 18 months, as detailed in the table below: D-2 D-1 P-5 P-4 P-3 P-2 GS (PL) GS (OL) Total Department of Management Strategy, Policy and Compliance 1 – 2 3 – 1 – – 7 Department of Operational Support – – – 1 – – – – 1 Total 1 – 2 4 – 1 – – 8 Abbreviations: GS (OL), General Service (Other level); GS (PL), General Service (Principal level).
paragraphs.4: Appropriates an additional amount of 1,194,200 United States dollars, comprising 861,400 dollars under section 29A, Department of Management Strategy, Policy and Compliance, and 332,800 dollars under section 29B, Department of Operational Support, of the programme budget for 2022;
paragraphs.5: Also appropriates an amount of 55,700 dollars under section 36, Staff assessment, to be offset by an equivalent amount under income section 1, Income from staff assessment, of the programme budget for 2022.
